item.title: 【HD Live Performances】WEB-RiP - Fujii Kaze - tiny desk concerts JAPAN - 29/03/24 - 720 NHK World Japan
item.description:
Hi! I'm back! So, today I wanted to show you this video that was recently on NHK's website and (annoyingly) is not on any YouTube channel (not even NPR Music!). it's Fujii Kaze on 'tiny desk concerts JAPAN'. If you never heard of it, then you might have known of NPR's Tiny Desk concerts on YouTube. this JAPAN version is an NHK Music X NPR Music collab. I am also gonna upload NHK World Japan Music Festival 2023 as well. Stay Tuned!

Synopsis: Renowned Japanese artist and international star Fujii Kaze makes his way to NHK's tiny desk in Shibuya, Tokyo! Embracing the spirit of the tiny desk, Fujii Kaze performs a set of original music and delivers an unparalleled original experience.

Tiny Desk Concerts is a video series of live concerts hosted by NPR Music (a project of National Public Radio or NPR for short). The regular version is on NPR's tiny desk in Washington, DC, while the JAPAN version is on NHK's tiny desk in Shibuya, Tokyo.

That's the odd part. it's only on NHK World Japan (either linearly through Cable or satellite or online through their app and website). Thankfully, their videos are DRM-free, so it takes just a downloader and that's it.

1. Matsuri
2. Garden
3. damn
4. Kirari
5. Michi Teyu Ku (Overflowing)
6. Shinunoga E-Wa
